header.title: Artifex.AI Studio Pro
header.subtitle: Your AI-powered creative suite for generating compelling product descriptions, visualizing ideas with detailed storyboards, and creating stunning media art.

storyboardForm.ideaPlaceholder: e.g., A cinematic trailer for a futuristic flying car.

storyboardSettings.title: Advanced Settings
storyboardSettings.videoNote: Video generation is an experimental feature and may take several minutes per clip.

storyboardDisplay.title: Generated Storyboard
storyboardDisplay.imageError: Image generation failed. You can try regenerating.
storyboardDisplay.quotaError: The image generation limit may have been reached for this model.
storyboardDisplay.generateClipTitle: Generate a short video clip for this scene.
storyboardDisplay.generatingClipHint: This can take a few minutes.
storyboardDisplay.generateClipPrompt: Generate a video clip for this scene.

detailedModal.title: Expand Scene
detailedModal.loadingMessage:
Generating detailed shots and images...
This may take a moment.

apiKeyInstructions.title: API Key Required
apiKeyInstructions.welcome: Welcome to Artifex.AI Studio! To get started, you'll need a Google Gemini API key.
apiKeyInstructions.step1: Go to {{link}} and create a new API key.
apiKeyInstructions.step2: In your project environment, create a variable named {{apiKey}}.
apiKeyInstructions.step3: Paste your key as the value for the variable and refresh this page.
apiKeyInstructions.disclaimer: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and is only used to communicate with the Google Gemini API.

mediaArt.selectImagePrompt: Select a source image to begin.
mediaArt.readyToGenerate: Choose your style and parameters, then bring your art to life.

mediaArtStyles.dataCompositionDesc: Data visualization, glitch, binary patterns. (Ryoji Ikeda style)
mediaArtStyles.digitalNatureDesc: Interactive particle systems: flowers, light. (teamLab style)
mediaArtStyles.aiDataSculptureDesc: Fluid, organic data visualization. (Refik Anadol style)
mediaArtStyles.lightAndSpaceDesc: Strobes, grids, structural light patterns. (NONOTAK style)
mediaArtStyles.kineticMirrorsDesc: Moving sculptures using reflected, fragmented images.
mediaArtStyles.generativeBotanyDesc: Algorithmically grown, surrealistic plants and flowers.
mediaArtStyles.quantumPhantasmDesc: Uncertain, shimmering visual effects inspired by quantum physics.
mediaArtStyles.architecturalProjectionDesc: Deconstructed, reprojected images onto geometric structures.

imageUploader.hint: Drop an image here or click to select a file

wandererSeaFog.title: Wanderer above the Sea of Fog

aSundayAfternoon.title: A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte

anatomyLesson.title: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp

errors.descriptionGeneration: Failed to generate description. Please try again.
errors.storyboardGeneration: Failed to generate storyboard. Please check your settings and try again.
errors.sceneExpansion: Failed to expand the scene. Please try again later.
errors.videoGeneration: Failed to generate video. This is an experimental feature and may not always succeed.
errors.mediaArtGeneration: Failed to generate media art scenes. The source image might be too complex or the style too demanding.
errors.visualArtGeneration: Failed to generate visual art video. Please try a different text or effect.
